com.r00li.rhome

Class RHomeActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • com.r00li.rhome.RHomeActivity

  • public class RHomeActivity
extends Activity
    Main class for the RHome system. This class controls all the main system functions.
    Author:
    Andrej Rolih

        butt - Button pressed

      • reportError

        public void reportError()
        Flashes an LED, beeps piezo speaker on the controller

      • sendMessage

        private void sendMessage(java.lang.String message)
        Method that sends a message to the arduino controller
        Parameters:
        message - Message to send to arduino controller. Must be formated correctly! DO NOT FORGET NULL TERMINATOR CHARACTER! Read more about the "protocol" in the rhome_serial.txt

      • engageMode

        public void engageMode(int mode)
        Call this when you want to engage one of the automatic modes.
        Parameters:
        mode - Selected mode - 1=sleep, 2=movie

      • messageRecv

        private void messageRecv(java.lang.String message)
        Method called when a message is received from arduino. You can implement different actions/responses here
        Parameters:
        message - message received from the arduino. Using the format XX=YYYYY (XX - action, YYYYY - parameters). Read more about the "protocol" in the rhome_serial.txt

      • mainloop

        private void mainloop()

      • enableDisableView

        private void enableDisableView(View view,
                     boolean enabled)
